title: 2bd 2ba, Professional onsite management, Henderson NV
posting_body: ['Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bathrooms:', '2', 'Square Feet:', '973', 'Address:', '501 E Lake Mead Pkwy', 'Seize your chance to make these peaceful, pet-friendly apartments set in the heart of Henderson, NV your home.', 'Conveniently located near the Cadence neighborhood with amazing city views of Las Vegas, make our community your new place to truly live!', 'Amenities Include:', 'Landscaped courtyard with outdoor seating and firepit', 'Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', 'Mountain views', 'In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Oversized closets', 'Onsite playground', 'Fenced dog park with pet watering station                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', 'Ceiling fans in living areas and bedrooms', 'Polished kitchen countertops', 'Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', 'Barbecue pavilion and picnic area', 'Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing OpportunityPrices Change DailyFlexible Lease Terms']
